lore: These creatures were imbued with a large amount of magic, and seven Nether Orbs were consumed in the process of their creation.\n\nThe Goddess of Illusion had to ask Vertraag for help so that Surathli could create the Geylian Ophan. It can see the past and the immediate future at once through its secondary eyes, and its power allows it to generate small time distortions that seem to accelerate anything inside of them.
menagerieDialog: (It appears to be deep in its own thoughts.)
(You're amazed at how much aggressive emotion a single eye can convey. It's time to take this creature out for a few battles.)
(It's staring directly at you. You can't but feel judged.)
(You can't help but find this creature's tiny little mouth endearing, even if it's mostly hidden by an enormous, bloodshot eyeball.)
(It closes its eye in an obvious attempt to make you think it's sleeping. You decide to leave it alone for now.)
name: Geylian Ophan
